item.title: Lavatory Waste Systems (Including Wheelchair Accessible Lavatories) – System Does Not Leak

remarks.para: Individual components may be inoperative provided:

numlitem.para: Associated components are deactivated or isolated, and
Associated system components are verified not to have leaks.

note.para: Any portion of system which is operative may be used.
If flush motor is inoperative, use bottle water to rinse bowl. Lavatory is considered operative provided system does not leak.

placard.para: For deactivated or isolated components, placard as appropriate: "INOP - DO NOT USE". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Verify associated system components do not have leaks.
